name: forwarding
description: Forwarding server app for wittylizard backend.

post-deploy-cmd: wget https://dl.google.com/cloudsql/cloud_sql_proxy.linux.amd64 && mv cloud_sql_proxy.linux.amd64 cloud_sql_proxy && chmod +x cloud_sql_proxy && mkdir /cloudsql && sudo chmod 777 /cloudsql && ./cloud_sql_proxy -dir=/cloudsql &

author: Alexander Ratcliffe
